session_info.title: Morning Energizing Breathwork
session_info.description: Breathing techniques to boost energy and mental clarity

preparation.posture: Sit tall or stand with spine straight
preparation.hand_position: Rest hands on knees or in lap

techniques.name: Three-Part Breath (Warm-up)
instructions: Place one hand on chest, one on belly
Breathe into belly first (bottom hand rises)
Continue breath into ribs (chest expands)
Finish breath into upper chest (top hand rises)
Exhale in reverse order: chest, ribs, belly
techniques.benefits: Increases lung capacity, calms nervous system

techniques.name: Bellows Breath (Bhastrika)
instructions: Take 10 rapid, strong breaths through nose
Pump belly in and out forcefully
After 10 breaths, take one deep breath in
Hold for 10 seconds
Exhale slowly and completely
Rest with natural breath for 30 seconds
Repeat for 3 rounds total
techniques.modifications: Start with 5 breaths if new to this technique

techniques.name: Alternate Nostril Breathing
instructions: Use right thumb to close right nostril
Inhale through left nostril
Close left nostril with ring finger
Release right nostril, exhale right
Inhale right nostril
Close right, release left, exhale left
This completes one round - continue for 2 minutes

techniques.name: Energizing Retention
instructions: Inhale deeply for 4 counts
Hold breath for 4 counts
Exhale for 4 counts
Hold empty for 2 counts
Repeat this 4-4-4-2 pattern
Return to natural breathing
Notice sensations in your body
Feel the energy and alertness you've created
Set intention to carry this energy into your day

daily_tips: Practice on empty stomach for best results
Start slowly and build intensity over time
